com.ftpos.library.smartpos.emv

Interface OnPinEntryCallback


  • public interface OnPinEntryCallback
    Copyright (C), 2015-2020,FEITIAN Technologies Co., Ltd. All rights reserved. Callback interface in the transaction processing process, the application needs to participate in processing related transactions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCancel()
      The Cancel key is pressed.
      void onConfirm(byte[] confirmInfo)
      The Enter key is pressed.
      void onError(int errorCode)
      The operation was successful or an error occurred.
      void onKeyDown(int len, int key)
      A number key is pressed.

    • Method Detail

      • onCancel

        void onCancel()
        The Cancel key is pressed.

      • onConfirm

        void onConfirm(byte[] confirmInfo)
        The Enter key is pressed.
        Parameters:
        confirmInfo - Result information. If Offline PIN is verified, SW value is returned;If Online PIN is verified, the PinBlock is returned.

      • onError

        void onError(int errorCode)
        The operation was successful or an error occurred.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - 0: Success; Other values: Error code. Refer toErrCode

      • onKeyDown

        void onKeyDown(int len,
               int key)
        A number key is pressed.
        Parameters:
        len - The total length of the PIN that has been entered.
        key - The type of key currently pressed.
